overview: Two LAPD Detectives take you on a bumpy, suspenseful ride along the streets of Los Angeles as Detectives Shane Murphy and Dre Allen navigate the twists and turns of life above and underground to stop a major gang war from exploding in the very same streets they grew up in only to find out a person very close to them is calling all the shots.
tagline: Nowhere to run, Nowhere to Hide, No Time to Lose
title: The 4 Points
